title: What is the history of the term: 'warning sign?' - Quora

response.answer_text: Sometimes the most puzzling aspect of Quora questions is that they have made it onto Quora at all. There is a good online etymological dictionary at Online Etymology Dictionary, which you might find helpful. Your main difficulty will be that there is no 'term' "warning sign". It is not a phrase or saying, any more than "blue hat" or "my dog". They are just a couple of words that mean what they say.
